1.1.1. cnclient¶

1.1.1.1. Module d1_client.cnclient¶

Synopsis:This module implements CoordinatingNodeClient, which extends DataONEBaseClient with functionality specific to Coordinating Nodes.
Created:2011-01-22
Author:DataONE (Vieglais, Dahl)

Classes

CoordinatingNodeClient([base_url, timeout, ...]) Connect to a Coordinating Node and perform REST calls against the CN API
